alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 12:47AM EDT until June 26 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Logan County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Simpson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1147 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Elkton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville, Adairville, Gordonsville, Neosheo, Dot, Lickskillet, Schley, Cave Springs, Keysburg and Schochoh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
